Adventurers' Guide:
I'll tell you one more time!
Hunt the Lost Buffaloes, Frost Buffaloes, Ursus Cubs, Ursuses, Lost Yetis, and Frost Yetis in the Frozen Labyrinth. Then slice off 30 cuts each of Buffalo Meat, Ursus Meat, and Yeti Meat. Once you've collected everything, go see Captain Vishotsky in the Town of Schuttgart.
